messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] New Issue of Connections
messages.msgSnippet: ... Folks are welcome to send a check or money order to subscribe. Please email me personally. Thanks! -- ~~Danielle Emily (9), Julia (7), Sam (6)
messages.messageBody:
Homeschlfor2@... wrote:
>
> I keep meaning to ask and getting sidetracked... is there someplace to
> mail in the subscription cost? We dont use a checking account or visa
> just cash and money orders! Thanks
>

Folks are welcome to send a check or money order to subscribe.

Please email me personally.

Thanks!

--
~~Danielle
Emily (9), Julia (7), Sam (6)
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] New Issue of Connections
messages.msgSnippet: I keep meaning to ask and getting sidetracked... is there someplace to mail in the subscription cost?  We dont use a checking account or visa just cash and
messages.messageBody:
I keep meaning to ask and getting sidetracked... is there someplace to mail in the subscription cost? We dont use a checking account or visa just cash and money orders! Thanks

Chrissy


-----Original Message-----
From: danielle.conger@...
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com; unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com; UnschoolingDiscussion@...
Sent: Thu, 2 Nov 2006 6:56 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] New Issue of Connections


The new issue of *Connections* is now available online at
http://connections.organiclearning.org

November's issue features an interview with unschooling mom and author
of _The Birth House_, Ami McKay, a really great unschooling dads column
by Ben Lovejoy, the inspirational story of "Raising Ryan," a guide dog
for the blind, and much, much more from several favorite unschooling
writers.

Enjoy!

--
~~Danielle
Emily (9), Julia (7), Sam (6)
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

Connections: ezine of unschooling and mindful parenting
http://connections.organiclearning.org
